title.rendered: Alleviate the burden of responding to phishing emails

content.rendered:
Phishing is prevalent now more than ever. A 2020 government survey reported that 86% of businesses have experienced phishing attacks in the past 12 months.

For IT teams, the monitoring, detection and response to phishing emails raised by end users is a time consuming and resource management heavy task.

To give you and your team time back, Falanx Cyber now offer an outsourced service that will effectively manage and report on any email phishing that your end users receive.

This means suspected phishing emails will be quickly assessed by one of our cyber security analysts who know exactly what to look for. Leaving you to free to take immediate action on the real threats to prevent security breaches or a network compromise.

How does the Suspicious Email Analysis Service work?

All our services are delivered by our approachable and experienced team of cyber analysts working as an extension of your IT team.

  • Step one – Your user submits the email via the Phish Alert Button (PAB) to Falanx for review.
  • Step two – Email is investigated by our team of experienced analysts.
  • Step three – Result of Falanx review sent to user and, if the Email is deemed malicious alerts made to previously agreed key contacts within your organisation.

The suspicious email analysis service is available now as part of our latest fully-managed MDR service, Triarii or as a stand-alone service.

To find out more about how Falanx Cyber can help protect your business with Suspicious Email Analysis whilst minimising the internal burden, call our team on +44 (0) 20 7856 9450 or email us at salesenquiries@falanx.com
